basics.name: Edgardo M. Dubose
basics.label: Technician
basics.summary: The purpose of submitting my resume to your company is to obtain a position with the opportunity to utilize my training and skills in the technician industry.

work.name: Construction Company Name
work.summary: Construction of houses, subcontract with Aslide. Applying Sofit, Siding. Use of saw, hammer, drill, tape measure etc.

work.name: Wire-man Assembler Company Name
work.summary: Assemble Chromatograph. Build product from scratch. Inspect all products before use. Apply circuit board. Soldering. Wire.

work.name: Wire-man Company Name
work.summary: Read electronic circuits schematics. Circuit board and soldering. Wire. Multi-task using voltage reading for assembly production.

work.name: Security Guard Company Name
work.summary: Front desk answer phones supplying customer service. HVAC systems, elevators. Security cameras. Patrol building secure.

work.name: Technician Company Name
work.summary: Consult helping customers plan for direct TV. Multi-tasking building satellites while installing. Assigning membership and handling account information. Install wire outlets, cut wire, ground wire, check for output of wire.

work.name: Supervisor Company Name
work.summary: Provided excellent customer service and satisfaction. Fielded phone calls and emails. Managed inventory. Maintained building equipment. Supervised employees. Track incoming and outgoing packages. Assemble appliances and furniture.

work.name: Sales Representative/Care Provider Company Name
work.summary: Sale Representative for incoming patients. Scheduled appointments for potential clients to visit the site. Answered inquires about the benefits and services of the site. Provided potential clients with different services and packages.

certifications.name: Certified to work with Autistic Individuals
